actions: Inspect Tires
Lubricate Hinge Pins
Lubricate Steering Pins (If Equipped)
Lubricate Rear Hitch
Lights - Check that all lights (including headlights) are functioning properly
Fuel system - Drain water and sediment from fuel filter
Engine - Remove any dirt from area surrounding the engine
Engine - Check oil level
Change engine oil and filter (15 L Engine Only)
Replace fuel filters (15 L Engine Only)
Check engine speeds, have speeds adjusted by your John Deere Dealer
Cab and ROPS - Check torque of mounting bolts and nuts
Alternator drive belt - Check for wear and damages, check belt tension
Transmission - Replace transmission oil filter, check oil level
Test coolant freeze point
Check suspended front axle accumulator charge pressure
Replace cab fresh air and recirculation filters
Change transmission, hydraulic, axle oil and filters
Clean aftertreatment fuel injector (15 L Engine)
Replace radiator pressure cap (15 L Engine)
Clean transmission sump screen
Inspect fan belt and auxiliary drive belt tensioners
Check axle end play2
Lubricate draft link support shaft bushing
Replace fuel tank vent filter
Replace Diesel Exhaust Fluid (DEF) dosing unit filter (FT4/Stave IV Engines Only)
Check HydraCushion'99 suspended front axle accumulator charge pressure (If Equipped).
Replace transmission drive shaft damper
Replace Diesel Exhaust Fluid (DEF) dosing unit filter (FT4/Stage IV Engines Only)
Replace Diesel Exhaust Fluid (DEF) tank vent filter (FT4/Stage IV Engines Only)
Replace transmission drive shaft damper
Replace Diesel Exhaust Fluid (DEF) dosing unit filter (FT4/Stage IV Engines Only)
Replace Diesel Exhaust Fluid (DEF) tank vent filter (FT4/Stage IV Engines Only)
